video.title: Kkotboda Namja
video.synopsis: Unassuming high school girl Jan Di stands up to -- and eventually falls for -- a spoiled rich kid who belongs to the school's most powerful clique.

episodes.synopsis: Just being rich isn't enough to survive the teen tyranny at Shinhwa -- outsiders or loners are often marked as targets by the bored über-clique F4.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A scandalous rumor is spread on the Internet that a second-year student at Shinhwa High School, identified as "Miss K," is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Not keen to watch Jan Di dancing with one of his best friends, Jun Pyo leaves the ballroom and ends up taking out his frustrations by the poolside.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Making a sudden decision, Jan Di tells her mother she has to go somewhere and runs off, heading toward Namsan Tower.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jan Di's bike is set on fire while she is assaulted with water balloons and blasted with a fire extinguisher.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A psychic predicts that Jan Di will be losing something important.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Jun Pyo plans to evict his best friend and Jan Di out of Shinhwa High School -- and out of F4.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Jan Di rushes to the hospital after hearing that Jun Pyo had been in an accident.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Yi-jung receives a hysterical call from his mother threatening to commit suicide because of his father.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Yi Jung receives a hysterical call from his mother, who is threatening to commit suicide because of his father.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A note indicates that class has been moved to the science lab. The lab is empty, but Jan Di waits, not noticing that the room is filling with fumes.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Jan Di's father gets taken away by loan sharks, which inevitably forces Jan Di's mother to swallow her pride and beg Madam Kang for help.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The F4 guys have moved on to university, while Jan Di has entered her final year of high school. She has not heard from Jun Pyo since he left.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Jan Di waits to hear the results of F3's meeting with Jun-pyo, and can tell from their expressions that it was not good.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: After treating Jan Di in a harsh manner, Mr. Jung prepares everything so that Jun-Pyo can see her in Seoul. Can he go without Madam Kang finding out?
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jan Di's family hears about Jun-pyo's engagement and asks her dejectedly if it's true.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Ji-hoo can see how hurt Jan Di is by the kiss, and continues to follow her as she walks around in a daze.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Jun-pyo starts seeing Jae-Kyung in a different way, like he's seeing her for the first time as a potential friend -- or maybe a kindred spirit.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is hell bent on drinking himself into oblivion.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: At home, Jun-hee thinks back to how her mother interfered in her life, in much the same way she's interfering in Jun-pyo's now.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Yi-jung is happily waiting for Eun-jae, until he accidentally overhears her phone conversation, which sounds like she is talking to a boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Jun-pyo pleads for Jan Di to tell him not to get married.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Jun-pyo tells Jan Di that he'll protect her, but to Jun-pyo's surprise, she says that she does not want to be protected or taken care of.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Feeling it's time to reveal the truth, Mr. Jung leads Jun-hee to the mystery patient's bedside, and at the sight of her father, Jun-hee breaks down.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Jun-pyo asks Yumi to make the lunchbox again, proving that Yumi had taken credit for her lunch.
episodes.title: Episode 25
